title: Risk factors and early preventive measures for long COVID in non-hospitalized patients: analysis of a large cohort in the United Arab Emirates
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 230

Author(s): Fatemeh Saheb Sharif-Askari, Hawra Ali Hussain Alsayed, Narjes Saheb Sharif-Askari, Basema Saddik, Ali Al Sayed Hussain, Rabih Halwani
